message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's worth $120 to you, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it. My initial offer is $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $105.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my valuation of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $106.
I understand your position, Bob. I am willing to consider your latest offer. My counteroffer is $106.50 for the product.
